1.0.0.name: connect20/shweta_testimonials
1.0.0.description:
This is a extension for loading the testimonials in a cms page with a very professional slider. 
This is very easy to maintain with no conflict of jquery.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
